name: Hamza Nouman
title: High School Student | Aspiring Software Engineer
summary: Motivated student with a passion for AI, backend development, and robotics. Focused on building real-world projects using Python, Flask, and React.

professional_experience.description: Worked on building Flask APIs, integrating Google Gemini for chatbot responses, and managing JSON-based knowledge databases.

projects.name: Gemini Chatbot
projects.description: Created an AI-powered chatbot that answers questions based on a structured résumé JSON file. Integrated with Gemini API and deployed via Flask.
